kjv_def: heresy (which is the Greek word itself), sect
strongs_def: properly, a choice, i.e. (specially) a party or (abstractly) disunion
outline:
1. act of taking, capture: e.g. storming a city
  2. choosing, choice
  3. that which is chosen
  4. a body of men following their own tenets (sect or party)
    1. of the Sadducees
    2. of the Pharisees
    3. of the Christians
  5. dissensions arising from diversity of opinions and aims
